circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Perry Matheson was reported as a missing person to the Orange County Sheriff's Department by his brother George Matheson.  Perry lived with his brother George and George reported Perry was distraught over their mother's recent illness.  Perry left on 09/30/93 at 0930 hours in his 1989 Toyota Corolla.  The vehicle was later found burned at the White Mount National Forest/Kankangamus Highway in Albany, NH.  The area was searched; however, there was no sign of Perry.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
56 year old Lynn Perry was reported missing from her Andover, VT residence during the overnight hours of July 27th, 2015.  

Mrs. Perry suffers from Alzheimer's and was last reported to be wearing blue pajamas and carrying a pink blanket.   An extensive search of the area surrounding her home met with negative results.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: was carrying a pink blanket
Last seen wearing blue pajamas with clouds and stars

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Bryan Gomez was reported missing on July 6, 2010 after not being seen since June 10, 2010. Bryan was reported by a neighbor after not seeing him for a few weeks and after the initial report his case worker called for a welfare check, as they had not heard from him since June 1, 2010.

Bryan Keith Gomez was located deceased and positively identified. Due to only partial remains being recovered, the case will remain active in NamUs.

Mary's last known sighting was at her residence in Searsburg VT on March 25th 2022.   Before Mary Reid went missing (on March 25th) , two witnesses observed a female matching her description in the area of her residence.  The witnesses reported a female outside appeared to be having a medical issue.  She was throwing up, had no shoes, she was unsteady on her feet and she was walking in and out of the roadway (VT RT 9). There have been numerous unconfirmed reports from citizens seeing someone matching Reid's description in Brattleboro VT.  She has yet to be successfully located.  Searches of the area have yielded no results. She has had no contact with her family since March 24th.  There are concerns for her welfare.  Mary has been known to hitchhike in the past.

Krystal was a passenger in a vehicle that crashed.  The driver was DUI and both females jumped into a raging river to avoid detection.  The driver was able to climb out of the water, and Krystal has not been seen since then.  Her purse was located downstream from where the females entered the water.
Donald was last seen at a party in Waitsfield in the early morning hours of Sunday 10/15/06. Messier did not return to work on Monday and has not contacted friends or family members since that date.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: Blue jeans, plaid black and blue button up type shirt.

vehicles.comment: NASCAR number displayed in the rear window

physicalDescription.facialHairDescription: Donald usually wears a goatee and mustache
physicalDescription.eyeDescription: Donald's eyes are also described as hazel

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
Grace Marie Reapp disappeared under suspicious circumstances with her daughter, Grace Noel Reapp (nickname "Gracie"), on June 6, 1978 from her residence located on Hanley Lane, Jericho, Vermont.
Authorities believed that Grace and Gracie's disappearances were extremely suspicious from the onset of their investigation. Grace Reapp has never contacted her family since she was last seen on June 6, 1978. 

For additional information, see the VTSP website: http://www.dps.state.vt.us/vtsp/missing/reapp_grace.htm

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
The disappeance of 18 year old Bennington College student Paula Welden showed a need for a dedicated agency to investigate missing people, and her case led directly to the 1947 formation of the Vermont State Police.

Paula Welden was last seen on the afternoon of December 1st, 1946. She left the campus that afternoon after telling her roommate she was going for a hike. Several hikers reported seeing her on the Long Trail, just off Route 9 near Glastenbury Mountain. She was reported missing by her roommate the following morning, after she did not return to campus.

An extensive search of the area did not show any signs of Welden. Investigators from New York, Massachusetts, and Connecticut assisted in the investigation, due to limited police services in Vermont at the time. Numerous theories were investigated, but no conclusive outcome was ever determined.

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance:
25-year-old Sean Hawley was last seen on the afternoon of May 9, 2015 in a black inflatable kayak by a witness in the area of Oak ledge Park in Burlington, VT. It is believed that during the next couple of days, Sean may have been on Stave Island located in South Hero, VT. Sean has not made contact with family or friends since the time he was reported missing.

Foul play is not suspected at this time, but there are concerns for Sean’s well-being.

Anyone with information is asked to contact the Colchester Police Department at 802-264-5556

circumstances.circumstancesOfDisappearance: Jeffrey was last seen at his home in Wilder Vermont.

Iris Brown was last seen leaving her apartment in Burlington on March 15, 1976 with a male acquaintance. The acquaintance arrived at Brown's apartment that day and told her he had just received a telegram from her boyfriend saying that he was being released early from prison and wanted the acquaintance to drive her to Connecticut to meet the boyfriend. The acquaintance offered conflicting stories about where he and Brown supposedly parted ways. The acquaintance  confessed to the killing Brown in April 2008. The acquaintance who initially claimed to have driven Brown to Springfield, Massachusetts, now maintains he never left Vermont, and may not have driven much beyond Barre, the last place he was seen the night Brown disappeared.

clothingAndAccessoriesArticles.description: A long green wool coat and blue jeans.
